outline:
1. to separate, set free, remove, open, escape, burst through
    1. (Qal)
      1. to remove (oneself), escape
      2. to set free, let out
kjv_def: dismiss, free, let (shoot) out, slip away.
strongs_def: to cleave or burst through, i.e. (causatively) to emit, whether literal or figurative (gape)
